description: Try our easy to follow Tapenade Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tapenade Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small ciabatta loaf, cut into 12 slices
12 marinated sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the ciabatta slices in a single layer on a baking sheet. Mix the oil, garlic, and chopped parsley together and brush over the bread slices. Bake in a preheated oven, at 204°C, for 10 minutes, until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, put the olives, garlic, parsley, capers, lemon juice, and oil in a food processor and process to a coarse paste. Season with salt and black pepper.
Spread the tapenade over the toasts and top each with a sun-dried tomato.
